forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 65 in the afternoon. West wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle after 11pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 58. West southwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
In the heart of Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon unfolds with a gentle caress of sunshine, casting a warm glow across the city’s iconic skyline. A mild breeze orchestrates a playful dance among the leaves, hinting at the shifting seasons as temperatures hover comfortably near 67 degrees. Yet, as the day wears on, a subtle shift beckons, promising a dip into the cooler embrace of the evening with falling temperatures. 

As night approaches, anticipation swells for the slight chance of drizzle after 11 PM, a whisper of moisture that will mingle with the clouds gathering above. The sky, mostly cloudy, envelops the city in a veil, while gusty winds offer both rhythm and refreshment. For those venturing outside, layering is wise; a light jacket or sweater will soften the chill as the evening settles in. Walking along the waterfront or finding a cozy café to enjoy a cup of coffee can be delightful pursuits on this softly turning day, where the elements converge in a delicate balance of warmth and coolness.
